name: INVECTOR
summary:
Turn up the volume and take rhythm gaming to new heights, all the way into space.

Fly solo or party with friends in a split screen race, as you join space pilot Stella on her journey from one stunning world to the next. 

Each hit song you play offers on the note level design and three difficulties to master.

In an exclusive collaboration, INVECTOR features superstar AVICII, one of the world’s biggest EDM artists, experienced like never before.

1-4 players
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
info:
• 开发: Hello There、Avicii
